title: [深度分析] 香港只有一條路

replies.msg:
When I sacrifice my youth to defend what's ours
When I say no to a law we never voted for
When I stop feeding an empire a world away
When I surrender my body not my mind
When I ask God to look the other way
When I refuse to learn the history of a country I've never seen

When I decide it will be them——not us

RISE 揭竿起義


香港只有一條路，就係獨立！揭竿起義！萬惡源於支那，支那豬滾出香港，香港獨立！經濟獨立，創建新經濟，打倒金融地產霸權！Singapore Can, Hong Kong Can! Hear the people sing! 拒絕家畜的安寧與虛假的繁榮，向進擊的支那人反撃！
